project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Create a Python script that generates a random password with configurable options for length and character types.

task.name: Implement functionality to generate a random password
Ensure the password includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
Create a user input mechanism for configurable password length
Write tests to verify the password generation, including different lengths and character sets
Execute tests to ensure password generation functions correctly
